column4: hello, pls I am trying to install python and thi sis what I have

what means you installed mini server to your desktop

there are tools like webmin to administer your server

probably, SSH or web interface, because he said it will be installed on his ubuntu PC
You should sort out a more precise plan of what you want to achieve
